metadata.title: CVE-2020-20891 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function config_input inlibavfilter/vf_gblur.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denialof Service or other unspecified impacts.

criterions.comment: vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
